Articles.Content:
<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/KU2OeXraGh4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

I went Moholing for the first time today and I must say I rather enjoyed it. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) Have you got any pics/videos of your Mohole adventures? If so please share! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)  
  
Cupcake...

my last mission to the Mohole was Asteroid-golf ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/X13w5_9-50w?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

> 
> that is hilarious

Need I remind you we're doing serious science here? I'll have you know it's no laughing matter. ![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)

> 
> kinky

Fifty shades of Bob Kerman? ![:kiss:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_kiss.gif)

> 
> my last mission to the Mohole was Asteroid-golf ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
> 
> 
> 
> <iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/X13w5_9-50w?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Good lord! ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif) Words fail me, how long did this take you to do!?

Cupcake...

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-19T10:32:09Z" title="02/19/2015 10:32  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 19, 2015</time> by Cupcake...**

> 
> Good lord! ![:0.0:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_shocked.gif) Words fail me, how long did this take you to do!?
> 
> Cupcake...

Oh - i spendet many time to do this - the hardest thing was to bring the asteroid from Kerbin in a good Moho-Orbit. To do this i have testet many transporters, but at the end its a funny use of asteroids. If someone have too much time, he can try to fill the hole complete with asteroids... ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

> 
> Oh - i spendet many time to do this - the hardest thing was to bring the asteroid from Kerbin in a good Moho-Orbit. To do this i have testet many transporters, but at the end its a funny use of asteroids. If someone have too much time, he can try to fill the hole complete with asteroids... ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

That's what E-Class asteroids and multiplayer are for.
Where is the Mohole? Sorry if that sounds noobish ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

> 
> <iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/KU2OeXraGh4?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>
> 
> I went Moholing for the first time today and I must say I rather enjoyed it. ![:wink:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) Have you got any pics/videos of your Mohole adventures? If so please share! ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> 
> Cupcake...

Wow. In my world, you just stole the title from streetlamp for best KSP video of all time. Very nice. Great music / cinematography.

> 
> Where is the Mohole? Sorry if that sounds noobish ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

Well, Moho. (Mercury analogue, closest to the sun)

I think it's at the north pole, to be exact.
Yes, it is the north pole of Moho. South pole is nothing interesting. Flat and quite dark nothing.

> 
> [http://imgur.com/a/ND3e5](http://imgur.com/a/ND3e5)

Oh dear. Well at least the compacted wreckage of this vessel may provide a stable landing base of sorts for future expeditions. ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

Cupcake...
